usage.description: This file contains sample facility types for all categories. Use the 'facilityTypeSamples' section for reference and the 'postmanFormDataExamples' section for direct copy-paste into Postman form-data fields.
categories: SPORTS_COURT - Tennis, basketball, and other sports courts
AMENITY_SPACE - Pools, libraries, and recreational spaces
postmanInstructions: 4. Add each field from postmanFormDataExamples as separate form-data entries
5. For 'details' field, copy the JSON string exactly as shown
6. Optionally add image files using 'images' field
